mapper.select: select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",d.IMEI_NUM as "imsi" ,d.USER_RATIO as "radio" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.area_type='Indoor' and d.statistics_time=#{maxDate}

select m.NEWIDX as "x",m.NEWIDY as "y",d.IMEI_NUM as "imsi",d.USER_RATIO as "radio",d.total_user_num as "allNum"
from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.stadium_no=#{region} and d.area_type='Indoor' and d.statistics_time=#{dateStr}
select d.stadium_no as "region",nvl(sum(d.total_user_num),0) as "userCount" from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d where d.area_type='Indoor' group by d.stadium_no
select max(d.statistics_time) from LTE_GRID_USER_NUM d where d.area_type='Indoor'
